This is the last and the best part of the brilliant THE CRIMINALS anthologies, maybe the real origin of the "rape" films. By this episode, things have descended more or less into complete cinematic depravity, with a double feature of exploitation mini-films far rougher than anything Quentin Tarantino or Robert Rodriguez could make.
 I hope you will enjoy this golden-age Hong Kong movie treasure. Exploitation, thriller, crime, horror? For me it's not important, just the power of 100% CINEMA!
